title: Slayer Jinx mini gun glitch
body: I have Slayer jinx and there is a visual glitch where when she basic's in mini gun the bullets freeze instead of disappearing when they collide rockets are fine though.

replies.body:
Hiya Hi Im Her Kirito! 

Thanks for the report! We're currently investigating this issue! ^-^
This is an important issue and i believe riot should look into it.
